unnormalised: Hey! Solar rooftop subsidies are awesome, right? Heard the scheme extended till Diwali. My cousin, Priya, in Bangalore, got almost Rs. 50,000 off. Thinking of installing one myself in Chennai. Heard good things about Tata Power's system. Saves money and helps the planet! Plus, more electricity to binge watch Netflix during Onam! Even if I can afford some extra biryani because of the savings. It's a win-win, ya know?
